ministry.name: Calvary Continuum
ministry.overview: Calvary Continuum is the media ministry of Calvary Chapel of Austin.

long-description.p: Calvary Continuum is comprised of the following areas:
Internet - manages the webs site and related technologies
Overhead/Lights - handles the lighting and overhead projector for lyrics and video
Radio - broadcasts of previous Sunday and Midweek messages on local radio
Sound - help make the worship team and the pastor sound good
Streaming Media - the group that enables you to listen to previous messages over the web
Tape and CD - messages on tape and CD
Video - broadcasts of previous messages on local TV
Visit the areas for more information about the media ministry and how you can serve.
